author: mvdb
msg: Fixed a double closing tag when wrapElementsinCollections is false.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o using betwixt as an example:
it would be good to define some best practices for writing tests with
Maven. the betwixt tests were failing from the reactor because test
files weren't using the ${basedir} property. so the AbstractTestCase
has been modified to store the value of ${basedir} and provides a
simple method resolving test files against ${basedir}. A similar
thing could be done for all types of resources and we could make
a set of base classes that maven provides to make test writing
easier and safer. the betwixt tests now pass from the reactor
